title: End of Season Rewards
body: If my 5's/3's team is gold but i am silver will i gold or silver rewards for the season?

replies.body: If you've won at least 10 games in your ranked team, you will earn its rewards. While you'll earn the Victorious skin no matter what mode you got Gold+ in, keep in mind that the border will only show in that mode.
In addition to this, if your team kicks from the team before the end of the season, you will not earn the rewards.
Just out of curiosity, what if you are reinvited to the team?  Does it remember your past participation, or do you need another 10 wins?
Just asked - It'll remember your record.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=ETPramnM,comment-id=0000000000000000,timestamp=2015-10-09T01:43:14.285+0000)
>
> Just asked - It'll remember your record.

Hey, do you know if we will get different icons for each team we are on like last season?  Like a special 3v3 and 5v5 icon in addition to the solo queue?
Pretty sure you only get the rewards for the highest ranking that you achieve.  So if you are Silver in Solo and have Plat on a 5s team, then you only get the Plat related rewards.

> [{quoted}](name=Sukishoo,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=ETPramnM,comment-id=000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2015-10-09T03:28:24.522+0000)
>
> Pretty sure you only get the rewards for the highest ranking that you achieve.  So if you are Silver in Solo and have Plat on a 5s team, then you only get the Plat related rewards.

I just remember last season you were able to get different icons for your highest in each one.  So if you were gold in single 3v3 and 5v5 you would get gold a solo queue gold icon a 3v3 gold icon and a 5v5 gold icon.
I'm not sure the specifics on this one, but there will be icons. As we get closer to the end of the season, there should be a bit more clarity around which icons you'll be receiving. :]
Any chance of that being changed? I don't see the purpose to that since there is already a 10 game win requirement so it seems unlikely to be abused.
We don't have plans to change how this works at this time.
wow so u dont have to play solo q to get the rewardz

You never did. You can play Ranked Teams or Solo and get the same rewards.

Only difference is that Solo/Duo you have one border, and then Ranked Teams you can have a different one depending on the ranking.
Im sorry, GETTING ATTENTION!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! Look at ma plague doctor champ idea plz. again, srry stormwinds for killing ur comment section.

On the Season 3 FAQ rewards Q&A, it says the team only needs to win 10 games while you are on the team. Do you actually have to participate in those wins to earn the rewards, or is it enough to just be on the team when they win those 10 games?

For 2014 season, it's *win* at least 10 games with your team. They hopefully should be updating the 2015 page sooner or later.
https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202080804-2014-Season-Rewards#h2q1

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/205028124-2015-Season-Ranked-Play-Guide
